site.name: AI Business Tools Showcase
site.description: Comprehensive collection of 15+ AI-powered business tools for automation, job search, content generation, insights, and productivity. Each tool is live and production-ready.

tools.name: MyJob: AI-Powered Job Search
tools.description: AI-driven job matching platform that analyzes resumes against job descriptions and provides interactive resume tailoring assistance.
tools.longDescription: MyJob uses advanced AI to match job seekers with opportunities by analyzing resume content and comparing it against job descriptions. Features include interactive resume tailoring, AI-powered suggestions, and multi-agent architecture for comprehensive job search assistance.

tools.name: Requirements Made Clear - PRD Generator
tools.description: Transform ideas into professional BRDs and PRDs in minutes with AI-guided conversations. No templates. No guesswork. Just clear requirements.
tools.longDescription: AI-powered requirements documentation tool that uses conversational AI to guide users through creating comprehensive Business Requirements Documents (BRDs) and Product Requirements Documents (PRDs). Eliminates the need for templates and reduces ambiguity in requirements gathering.

tools.name: AI Storybook Creator
tools.description: AI로 만드는 맞춤형 그림책 - Create personalized illustrated storybooks with AI from text to illustrations in minutes.
tools.longDescription: Korean-language AI tool that enables anyone to create customized illustrated storybooks. Users can create age-appropriate and interest-based picture books in minutes, with AI handling both text generation and illustration creation.

tools.name: AI Content Generation Hub
tools.description: Effortlessly convert presentations, scripts, audio, and YouTube videos into engaging scripts, podcasts, blog posts, and transcripts with AI.
tools.longDescription: Multi-format content conversion platform powered by AI. Transforms various input formats (presentations, scripts, audio, video) into multiple output formats (scripts, podcasts, blog posts, transcripts) with high accuracy and engagement optimization.

tools.name: AI-Powered Insights Platform
tools.description: Generate comprehensive, validated insights on any topic using advanced AI research agents. Get structured analysis with confidence scores and actionable intelligence.
tools.longDescription: Enterprise-grade AI research platform that generates comprehensive insights on any topic using multiple AI research agents. Provides validated information with confidence scores, structured analysis, and actionable recommendations.

tools.name: AI Workshop & Training
tools.description: We train you to build your business automation. Streamline processes, reduce costs, and increase efficiency with expert AI solutions.
tools.longDescription: Professional AI training and workshop platform that teaches businesses and individuals how to implement AI automation. Covers practical AI implementation, process optimization, and cost reduction strategies.

tools.name: InvestorHub Platform
tools.description: Smart, transparent investment platform with AI-powered investment scoring and analysis.
tools.longDescription: AI-enhanced investment platform providing transparent investment opportunities with AI-powered scoring and analysis. Helps investors make informed decisions through comprehensive data analysis and risk assessment.

tools.name: InvestorHub Dashboard
tools.description: Comprehensive dashboard for InvestorHub platform with real-time analytics and portfolio management.
tools.longDescription: Advanced dashboard interface for InvestorHub providing real-time analytics, portfolio tracking, and investment management capabilities.

tools.name: QR Code Generator
tools.description: Generate QR codes for any website instantly with customization options.
tools.longDescription: Simple, fast QR code generator for websites and URLs. Provides instant QR code generation with customization options for size, color, and format.

tools.name: AI Survey Generator
tools.description: AI-powered tool for creating professional surveys and forms with intelligent question generation.
tools.longDescription: Intelligent survey creation platform using AI to generate contextually appropriate questions. Supports templates and custom prompts, with review, customization, and multiple sharing options. Alternative to manual form creation with enhanced AI capabilities.

tools.name: Website Screenshot Capture
tools.description: Capture full-page screenshots of any website instantly with high quality.
tools.longDescription: Professional website screenshot tool that captures full-page screenshots of any website. Provides high-quality images suitable for documentation, presentations, and archiving.

tools.name: Video Audio Synthesizer
tools.description: Combine video and audio tracks directly in your browser without uploads.
tools.longDescription: Browser-based video and audio combining tool that works entirely client-side. Merge video and audio tracks without uploading to servers, ensuring privacy and speed.

presentations.name: MyJob Investment Presentation
presentations.description: Complete presentation showcasing MyJob's AI-powered job search platform, featuring multi-agent architecture, comprehensive features, and future enhancement roadmap.

presentations.name: AI와 함께 꿈을 찾는 법
presentations.description: 인생 롤러코스터, 산 너머 산, 꿈의 연속, 다양한 목표 달성법으로 동기부여, 미래 사회가 원하는 인재의 역량, AI 시대를 주도할 핵심 역량.

presentations.name: What is Vibe Coding?
presentations.description: How AI can transform ideas into working code using natural language. Covers programming's role in bridging human intent and machine execution, debunks AI coding myths, and emphasizes expertise, iteration, and domain knowledge for effective AI-augmented development.

presentations.name: Beyond Vibe Coding
presentations.description: Examining limitations of AI-assisted vibe coding and real-world challenges in security, scalability, performance, quality, deployment, legal compliance, and service choices. Highlights systematic engineering expertise needed for production-ready applications.
